C2 the act of making something known that was secret, or a fact that is made known: a moment of revelation [ + that ] His wife divorced him after the revelation that he was having an affair. Shocking revelations about their private life appeared in the papers. come as/be a revelation
C2 to be an extremely pleasant surprise: This book came as a complete revelation to me.
